plot: A film actress is murdered by her estranged husband who is jealous of all her young boyfriends. The next day, writer Robert Tisdall (who happens to be one such boyfriend) discovers her body on the beach. He runs to call the police, however, two witnesses think that he is the escaping murderer. Robert is arrested, but owing to a mix up at the courthouse, he escapes and goes on the run with a police constable's daughter Erica, determined to prove his innocence.   Written by  Col Needham
title: Inocencia y juventud

write.role: (based on the novel entitled &"A Shilling For Candles&" by)
write.name: Josephine Tey
